name: Jill's day Comiket99 Ver English
description:
Please note that there is in game audio. If you hear no sound when playing on a smartphone, please check your phone's volume and silent/vibrate mode settings.

◇Method of operation◇

keyboard:
[Move, Select] 　
Up - Up Arrow / W   　
Down - Down Arrow / S   　
Left - Left Arrow / A   　
Right - Right Arrow / D [Interact] 　
A - Alt / Z / J  [Cancel, Back] 　
B - Ctrl / K / X  　
Press and hold the B button to speed up the message.
Start - Enter   (not used)
Select - Shift  (not used)

It seems that controllers such as Xbox can also be used.

◇Message◇
This is a demo version of VA-11 Hall-A, a secondary game being created by GB Studio. This is the Comiket 99 version, upgraded from the last demo version.
The number of places and characters you can check has increased.
As usual, there are no riddles or flags to solve, so please enjoy the pixel art, BGM, and conversations.

Contact: Twitter
